sentences.en: Cable strippers include cable knives and snips.
sentences.cn: 电缆剥离器包括电缆刀片和剪刀.

sentences.en: Our leading products include various gardening scissors, iron scissors, aviation snips, cable cutters etc.
sentences.cn: 本公司主要生产、经营:园艺剪 、 铁皮剪 、 航空白铁剪及电缆剪等.

sentences.en: Pick up the snips of cloth and thread from the floor.
sentences.cn: 拾起地板上的布片和线头.

sentences.en: Snips of information about the upcoming merger.
sentences.cn: 有关即将合并的零星消息.

sentences.en: With a few quick snips of the shears he pruned the bush.
sentences.cn: 他用大剪刀几下子就把灌木给修剪好了.

trans.tran_cn: （剪金属板的）铁剪，铁铗，剪下之物( snip的名词复数 )，一点点，零星
剪( snip的第三人称单数 )
